description:
Clip-in trail shoes that don’t look like they're part of a whole Spandex outfit. Designed to work with 2-hole cleats, these shoes are comfy on and off the bike. Rugged construction handles gnarly rock gardens, and even the odd pedal bite (better the shoe than you). A stiff shank and deep cleat box offer excellent power transfer and provides a confident connection when things get techie, or airborne.

  • Deep cleat box has a ramped entry and exit, making sure nothing gets between you and clipping in
  • Cleat box has index marking for dialing in the perfect cleat placement
  • Tough Cordura® uppers dry quickly and let your feet breathe
  • Added TPU protection at the heel and toe
  • Hook-and-loop strap across the laces
  • Elastic lace pouch keeps laces out of your drivetrain
  • D3O® zone tech insoles add protection under heel and ball of the foot
  • Antibacterial mesh helps keep the funk to a minimum
  • Fully gusseted tongue
  • Low-volume design with tailored padding around the toe and collar
  • Flex designed into the heel cup for support through the whole pedal stroke
  • Works with SPDs and Crank Brothers cleats
  • Stiff shank maximizes power transfer
  • Deeply lugged sole with reverse lugs at heel and toe for comfortable walking and traction
name: Ride Concepts Flume Clip Cycling Shoes - Women's
